greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows T(n,k), (n >= 1, k >= 1), in which row n has length A000041(n-1) and every column k is A006218.
example: For n = 6, the length of row 6 is A000041(5) = 7.
The sum of row 6 is 14 + 8 + 5 + 3 + 3 + 1 + 1 = 35, equaling A006128(6).
xref: Members of the same family are: A336811, A339278, A339304, A340423.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 10 2021
